thread.title: 'Rogue One' Blu-Ray Details and Trailer Revealed
thread.title_full: 'Rogue One' Blu-Ray Details and Trailer Revealed

title: 'Rogue One' Blu-Ray Details and Trailer Revealed
text:
12:48pm PT by Aaron Couch 'Rogue One' Blu-Ray Details and Trailer Revealed Courtesy of Disney Disney has launched a trailer touting the home entertainment released. The 'Star Wars' standalone has earned more than $1 billion at the box office. 
Rogue One: A Star Wars Story is heading home. 
Disney has revealed that Rogue One will hit Digital HD on March 24 and Blu-ray on April 4. It's also shared for the release. 
There are a lot of bonus features, but a few of the more intriguing ones include "Epilogue: The Story Continues," which is billed as the cast and crew looking forward to the Star Wars stories to come, and "Rogue Connections," which looks at the film's Easter eggs. There's also a featurette examining the visual effects that went into resurrecting Peter Cushing's Grand Moff Tarkin and brought back a young Princess Leia (Carrie Fisher). 
Rogue One earned more than $1 billion worldwide at the box office, including $528.8 million in the U.S. The second Star Wars standalone movie, a young Han Solo film, will be released in May 2018. Aaron Couch
